00039 #include <cmath>

00046 Transform::Transform()
00047 {
00048         m_mdir = m_minv = new Matrix4x4;
00049 }
00050 
00051 Transform::Transform( const SoTransform& coinTransform )
00052 {
00053         SbMatrix coinMatrix;
00054         coinMatrix.setTransform( coinTransform.translation.getValue(),
00055                                          coinTransform.rotation.getValue(),
00056                                          coinTransform.scaleFactor.getValue(),
00057                                              coinTransform.scaleOrientation.getValue(),
00058                                              coinTransform.center.getValue() );                         
00059         
00060         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( coinMatrix[0][0], coinMatrix[1][0], coinMatrix[2][0], coinMatrix[3][0],
00061                                                         coinMatrix[0][1], coinMatrix[1][1], coinMatrix[2][1], coinMatrix[3][1],
00062                                                         coinMatrix[0][2], coinMatrix[1][2], coinMatrix[2][2], coinMatrix[3][2],
00063                                                         coinMatrix[0][3], coinMatrix[1][3], coinMatrix[2][3], coinMatrix[3][3] );
00064                                 
00065         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00066 }
00067 
00068 Transform::Transform( double mat[4][4] )
00069 {
00070         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( mat[0][0],mat[0][1],mat[0][2],mat[0][3],
00071                                 mat[1][0],mat[1][1],mat[1][2],mat[1][3],
00072                                 mat[2][0],mat[2][1],mat[2][2],mat[2][3],
00073                                 mat[3][0],mat[3][1],mat[3][2],mat[3][3] );
00074         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00075 }
00076 
00077 Transform::Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir )
00078 : m_mdir(mdir)
00079 {
00080         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00081 }

00083 Transform::Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir, const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& minv )
00084 : m_mdir(mdir), m_minv(minv)
00085 {
00086 }
00087 
00088 Transform::Transform( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00089                           double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00090                           double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00091                           double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 )
00092 {
00093         m_mdir = new Matrix4x4( t00, t01, t02, t03,
00094                                 t10, t11, t12, t13,
00095                                 t20, t21, t22, t23,
00096                                 t30, t31, t32, t33 );
00097         m_minv = m_mdir->Inverse();
00098 
00099 }

00101 Transform::	Transform( const Transform& rhs )
00102 : m_mdir(rhs.m_mdir), m_minv(rhs.m_minv)
00103 {
00104 }
00105 
00106 Transform Transform::GetInverse() const
00107 {
00108         return Transform( m_minv, m_mdir );     
00109 }       
00110 
00111 Transform Transform::Transpose() const
00112 {
00113         return Transform( m_mdir->Transpose(), m_mdir->Transpose()->Inverse() );        
00114 }
00115 
00116 Point3D Transform::operator()( const Point3D& point ) const 
00117 {    
00118         double x = point.x, y = point.y, z = point.z;
00119         double xp = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z + m_mdir->m[0][3];
00120         double yp = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z + m_mdir->m[1][3];
00121         double zp = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z + m_mdir->m[2][3];
00122         double wp = m_mdir->m[3][0]*x + m_mdir->m[3][1]*y + m_mdir->m[3][2]*z + m_mdir->m[3][3];
00123 
00124         if( wp == 1.0 ) return Point3D( xp, yp, zp );
00125         else return Point3D( xp, yp, zp )/wp;
00126 
00127 }
00128 
00129 void Transform::operator()( const Point3D& point, Point3D* transformedPoint ) const
00130 {
00131         double x = point.x, y = point.y, z = point.z;
00132         transformedPoint->x = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z + m_mdir->m[0][3];
00133         transformedPoint->y = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z + m_mdir->m[1][3];
00134         transformedPoint->z = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z + m_mdir->m[2][3];
00135         double transformedW = m_mdir->m[3][0]*x + m_mdir->m[3][1]*y + m_mdir->m[3][2]*z + m_mdir->m[3][3];
00136         if( transformedW != 1.0 ) *transformedPoint /= transformedW;
00137 }
00138 
00139 Vector3D Transform::operator()( const Vector3D& vector ) const
00140 {
00141         double x = vector.x, y = vector.y, z = vector.z;
00142         return Vector3D( m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z,
00143                                  m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z,
00144                                  m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z );
00145 }
00146 
00147 void Transform::operator()( const Vector3D& vector, Vector3D* transformedVector ) const
00148 {
00149         double x = vector.x, y = vector.y, z = vector.z;
00150         transformedVector->x = m_mdir->m[0][0]*x + m_mdir->m[0][1]*y + m_mdir->m[0][2]*z;
00151         transformedVector->y = m_mdir->m[1][0]*x + m_mdir->m[1][1]*y + m_mdir->m[1][2]*z;
00152         transformedVector->z = m_mdir->m[2][0]*x + m_mdir->m[2][1]*y + m_mdir->m[2][2]*z;
00153 }
00154 
00155 Normal Transform::operator()( const Normal& normal ) const 
00156 {
00157         double x = normal.x, y = normal.y, z = normal.z;
00158         return Normal( m_minv->m[0][0]*x + m_minv->m[1][0]*y + m_minv->m[2][0]*z,
00159                    m_minv->m[0][1]*x + m_minv->m[1][1]*y + m_minv->m[2][1]*z,
00160                    m_minv->m[0][2]*x + m_minv->m[1][2]*y + m_minv->m[2][2]*z );
00161 }
00162 
00163 void Transform::operator()( const Normal& normal, Normal* transformedNormal ) const
00164 {
00165         double x = normal.x, y = normal.y, z = normal.z;
00166         transformedNormal->x = m_minv->m[0][0]*x + m_minv->m[1][0]*y + m_minv->m[2][0]*z;
00167         transformedNormal->y = m_minv->m[0][1]*x + m_minv->m[1][1]*y + m_minv->m[2][1]*z;
00168         transformedNormal->z = m_minv->m[0][2]*x + m_minv->m[1][2]*y + m_minv->m[2][2]*z;
00169 }

00171 Ray Transform::operator()( const Ray& ray ) const
00172 {
00173         Ray transformedRay;
00174         ( *this )( ray.origin, &transformedRay.origin );
00175         ( *this )( ray.direction, &transformedRay.direction );
00176         transformedRay.mint = ray.mint;
00177         transformedRay.maxt = ray.maxt;
00178         return transformedRay;  
00179 }
00180 
00181 void Transform::operator()( const Ray& ray, Ray* transformedRay ) const
00182 {
00183         ( *this )( ray.origin, &transformedRay->origin );
00184         ( *this )( ray.direction, &transformedRay->direction );
00185         transformedRay->mint = ray.mint;
00186         transformedRay->maxt = ray.maxt;
00187 }

00189 BBox Transform::operator()( const BBox& bbox  ) const
00190 {
00191         const Transform& M = *this;
00192         BBox ret(  M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00193         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00194         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00195         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00196         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00197         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00198         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00199         ret = Union( ret, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00200         return ret;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void Transform::operator()( const BBox& bbox, BBox* transformedBbox  ) const
00204 {
00205         const Transform &M = *this;
00206         transformedBbox = new BBox(          M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00207         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00208         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00209         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00210         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMin.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00211         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMin.z ) ) );
00212         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMin.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00213         *transformedBbox = Union( *transformedBbox, M( Point3D( bbox.pMax.x, bbox.pMax.y, bbox.pMax.z ) ) );
00214 }

00216 
00217 Transform Transform::operator*( const Transform& rhs ) const 
00218 {
00219         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = Mul( m_mdir, rhs.m_mdir );
00220         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = Mul( rhs.m_minv, m_minv );
00221         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00222 }
00223 
00224 bool Transform::SwapsHandedness( ) const 
00225 {
00226         double det = ( ( m_mdir->m[0][0] * 
00227                            ( m_mdir->m[1][1] * m_mdir->m[2][2] - 
00228                              m_mdir->m[1][2] * m_mdir->m[2][1] ) ) -
00229                    ( m_mdir->m[0][1] *
00230                        ( m_mdir->m[1][0] * m_mdir->m[2][2] -
00231                          m_mdir->m[1][2] * m_mdir->m[2][0] ) ) +
00232                    ( m_mdir->m[0][2] *
00233                        ( m_mdir->m[1][0] * m_mdir->m[2][1] -
00234                          m_mdir->m[1][1] * m_mdir->m[2][0] ) ) );
00235         return det < 0.0;
00236 }
00237 
00238 bool Transform::operator==( const Transform& tran ) const
00239 {
00240     if( this == &tran ) 
00241         return true;
00242     else 
00243     return( 
00244         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00245         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00246         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00247         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[0][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[0][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00248         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00249         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00250         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00251         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[1][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[1][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00252         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00253         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00254         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00255         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[2][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[2][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00256         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][0] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][0]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00257         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][1] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][1]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00258         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][2] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][2]) < DBL_EPSILON ) && 
00259         ( fabs(m_mdir->m[3][3] - tran.m_mdir->m[3][3]) < DBL_EPSILON ) );
00260 }
00261 
00262 Transform Translate( const Vector3D& delta ) 
00263 {
00264         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,  delta.x,
00265                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,  delta.y,
00266                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,  delta.z,
00267                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,      1.0  );
00268 
00269         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0, -delta.x,
00270                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0, -delta.y,
00271                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0, -delta.z,
00272                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,      1.0  );
00273                                            
00274         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00275 }
00276 
00277 Transform Translate( double x, double y, double z)
00278 {
00279         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,   x,
00280                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,   y,
00281                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,   z,
00282                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0, 1.0 );
00283 
00284         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4(   1.0,   0.0,   0.0,   -x,
00285                                            0.0,   1.0,   0.0,   -y,
00286                                            0.0,   0.0,   1.0,   -z,
00287                                            0.0,   0.0,   0.0,  1.0 );
00288 
00289         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00290 }
00291 
00292 Transform Scale( double sx, double sy, double sz ) 
00293 {
00294         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4(    sx,     0.0,    0.0,  0.0,
00295                                            0.0,      sy,    0.0,  0.0,
00296                                            0.0,     0.0,     sz,  0.0,
00297                                            0.0,     0.0,    0.0,  1.0 );
00298                                            
00299         Ptr<Matrix4x4> minv = new Matrix4x4( 1.0/sx,    0.0,    0.0,  0.0,
00300                                             0.0, 1.0/sy,    0.0,  0.0,
00301                                             0.0,    0.0, 1.0/sz,  0.0,
00302                                             0.0,    0.0,    0.0,  1.0 );
00303 
00304         return Transform( mdir, minv );
00305 }
00306 
00307 Transform RotateX( double angle ) 
00308 {
00309         // angle is assumed to be in radians.
00310         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00311         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00312 
00313         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( 1.0,      0.0,       0.0, 0.0,
00314                                          0.0, cosAngle, -sinAngle, 0.0,
00315                                          0.0, sinAngle,  cosAngle, 0.0,
00316                                          0.0,      0.0,       0.0, 1.0  );
00317                              
00318         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00319 }
00320 
00321 Transform RotateY(double angle) 
00322 {
00323         // angle is assumed to be in radians.   
00324         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00325         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00326         
00327         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( cosAngle, 0.0, sinAngle, 0.0,
00328                                               0.0, 1.0,      0.0, 0.0,
00329                                         -sinAngle, 0.0, cosAngle, 0.0,
00330                                               0.0, 0.0,      0.0, 1.0  ); 
00331                                  
00332         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00333 }
00334 
00335 
00336 Transform RotateZ( double angle ) 
00337 {
00338         // angle is assumed to be in radians.   
00339         double sinAngle = sin( angle );
00340         double cosAngle = cos( angle );
00341         
00342         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( cosAngle, -sinAngle, 0.0, 0.0,
00343                                          sinAngle,  cosAngle, 0.0, 0.0,
00344                                               0.0,       0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00345                                               0.0,       0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00346                                               
00347         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00348 }
00349 
00350 Transform Rotate( double angle, const Vector3D& axis ) 
00351 {
00352         // angle is assumed to be in radians.
00353         Vector3D a = Normalize( axis );
00354         double s = sin( angle );
00355         double c = cos( angle );
00356         double m[4][4];
00357 
00358         m[0][0] = a.x * a.x + (1.0 - a.x * a.x) * c;
00359         m[0][1] = a.x * a.y * (1.0 - c) - a.z * s;
00360         m[0][2] = a.x * a.z * (1.0 - c) + a.y * s;
00361         m[0][3] = 0.0;
00362 
00363         m[1][0] = a.x * a.y * (1.0 - c) + a.z * s;
00364         m[1][1] = a.y * a.y + (1.0 - a.y * a.y) * c;
00365         m[1][2] = a.y * a.z * (1.0 - c) - a.x * s;
00366         m[1][3] = 0.0;
00367 
00368         m[2][0] = a.x * a.z * (1.0 - c) - a.y * s;
00369         m[2][1] = a.y * a.z * (1.0 - c) + a.x * s;
00370         m[2][2] = a.z * a.z + (1.0 - a.z * a.z) * c;
00371         m[2][3] = 0.0;
00372 
00373         m[3][0] = 0.0;
00374         m[3][1] = 0.0;
00375         m[3][2] = 0.0;
00376         m[3][3] = 1.0;
00377 
00378         Ptr<Matrix4x4> mdir = new Matrix4x4( m );
00379         return Transform( mdir, mdir->Transpose() );
00380 }
00381 
00382 Transform LookAt( const Point3D& pos, const Point3D& look, const Vector3D& up )
00383 {
00384         double m[4][4];
00385         m[0][3] = pos.x;
00386         m[1][3] = pos.y;
00387         m[2][3] = pos.z;
00388         m[3][3] = 1.0;
00389         
00390         Vector3D dir = Normalize( look - pos );
00391         Vector3D right = CrossProduct( dir, Normalize( up ) );
00392         Vector3D newUp = CrossProduct( right, dir );
00393 
00394         m[0][0] = right.x;
00395         m[1][0] = right.y;
00396         m[2][0] = right.z;
00397         m[3][0] = 0.0;
00398         
00399         m[0][1] = dir.x;
00400         m[1][1] = dir.y;
00401         m[2][1] = dir.z;
00402         m[3][1] = 0.0;
00403         
00404         m[0][2] = newUp.x;
00405         m[1][2] = newUp.y;
00406         m[2][2] = newUp.z;
00407         m[3][2] = 0.0;
00408 
00409         Ptr<Matrix4x4> camToWorld = new Matrix4x4( m );
00410         return Transform( camToWorld->Inverse(), camToWorld );
00411 }
00412 
00413 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Transform& tran )
00414 {
00415         os << (*tran.GetMatrix());
00416         return os;
00417 }
